levels.Ⅰ:
:instant: Reduce the :damage: from enemy retaliation by 1.

This effect doubles for the [Dread Knights unit](../units/dread_knights.md).
levels.Ⅳ: :ongoing: For this Combat, when an enemy performs a Retaliation Attack against this [unit](../units/index.md), roll 2 [Attack dice](../dice.md#attack-die) and resolve the lower outcome.
levels.Ⅵ:
:instant: Reduce the :damage: from enemy retaliation by 2.

This effect doubles for the [Dread Knights unit](../units/dread_knights.md).
